feed.title: Charlie Bob Gordon: Digital Designer
feed.subtitle: Digital designer in Suffolk with over 6 years of agency experience designing websites, mobile applications, user interfaces, printed collateral and presentations all with a user-centric and analytical approach.

entry.title: Property info card
entry.content: I created this property info card shot as part of the Daily UI Design Challenge where I challenged myself to design something everyday for 100 days to flex my creative muscle.
entry.summary: I created this property info card shot as part of the Daily UI Design Challenge where I challenged myself to design something everyday for 100 days to flex my creative muscle.
